scenario.dependencies: ExtTGDs: r(a: $x, b: $y), $y == "3" -> s(a: $y, b: $z). r(a: $x, b: $y), $y == "5" -> s(a: $y, b: "6"). ExtEGDs: //s(a: $y1, b: $x), s(a: $y2, b: $x), r(a: $z1, b:$y1), r(a: $z2, b:$y2) -> $y1 == $y2. s(a: $y1, b: $x), s(a: $y2, b: $x), r(a: $z1, b:$y1) and not exists(r(a: $z2, b:$y2)) -> $y1 == $y2. //s(a: $y1, b: $x), s(a: $y2, b: $x) and not exists(r(a: $z1, b:$y1)) and not exists(r(a: $z2, b:$y2)) -> $y1 == $y2.
